channel.title: [making a server] Help! [making a server]
channel.description:
[center]Hi guys, This is Dan again, the cool and no life awesome 9 year old hehe :P.[/center]
[center]ok, umm i am here to say i need HELP making a server[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Support[/size][/center]
[center]Hoster[/center] [color=red][center]No Hoster[/center]
[center]Coder[/center] [center]Me[/center]
[center][color=red]Website Maker[/center] [center]Me[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Stuff You Need To Know[/size][/center] [center]Make a 562[/center] [center]Use Pkevolution source or Rs2hd[/center] [center]I am Coder With You[/center] [center]I am Website maker[/center] [center]Plus Do Not MESS up[/center]
[center]Thanks![/center] [center]~~~Dan~~~[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Add My Msn[/size][/center] [center]Zam500500@hotmail.com[/center]

We donâ€™t allow requests for direct programmers or people to host your server. You can create a development team, but make sure to follow the rules and guidelines in the sections first.
